itunes:title: Episode 1120 - A Handsome Cop Joins Us
title: Episode 1120 - A Handsome Cop Joins Us
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
SEAL Team star Justin Melnick joins the show to talk about how he's too handsome for makeup when he's on TV, why Jordan is the most fun country in the world to travel to, and just how depraved the internet really is.
